item.title: USB Goodies 2008
item.author: mubix
item.description: **EDIT: **Switching something from “DRAFT” to “PUBLISH” is a really important step. Sorry guys. Let me preface all of these tools with, the fact that some don’t come “portable”. To make them so, I have dropped the installer / setup file into Universal Extractor and then cleaned up the directory. PortSwigger’s Burp Suite - http://portswigger.net/suite/ This tool is essential to any web application security guru’s tool belt. If you haven’t used it already it is time to get schooled up on this wreaking ball.
